text: West African Hot Chocolate Pour the milk into the heavy-based saucepan. Tip in the chocolate, honey and sugar. Stir to combine. Add the cinnamon stick as well.  Place on a gentle heat to melt the chocolate. Stir continuously as the chocolate heats, to help it to melt faster. Pour in the vanilla extract. If you're using rum, now is the time to add it also. Fish out the cinnamon stick.  Pour the drink into two large mugs. If needed, sweeten to taste. Serve immediately.  South African Hot Chocolate Heat the milk. Pour into a saucepan and heat gently. Add the chocolate cake mix to a mixing bowl. Add sugar to taste. Be aware that the cake mix may already contain enough sugar. Then mix them together. Pour hot water in with the hot milk.  Pour the chocolate cake mix in the milk.  Add a few scoops of vanilla ice cream. Mix it in. Stir to mix everything together well. There might be some of the cake mix on top but it will melt away. Serve. Enjoy.
